statements: SELECT * FROM agricultural_supplies_inventory
SELECT id, product_name FROM agricultural_supplies_inventory
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM agricultural_supplies_inventory WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT * FROM agricultural_supplies_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, unit FROM agricultural_supplies_inventory WHERE unit = 'kg'
SELECT * FROM agricultural_supplies_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM agricultural_supplies_inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 500;
SELECT product_name, unit, quantity FROM agricultural_supplies_inventory WHERE unit = 'kg' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit FROM agricultural_supplies_inventory WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM agricultural_supplies_inventory WHERE unit NOT IN ('kg', 'lbs') ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Fertilizers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, quantity FROM Fertilizers WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT id, manufacturer FROM Fertilizers ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT * FROM Pesticides WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM Pesticides WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Fertilizers WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY manufacturer ASC
SELECT id, name FROM Pesticides WHERE name LIKE '%organic%' OR name LIKE '%natural%'
SELECT name, quantity FROM Fertilizers WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc'
SELECT * FROM Pesticides WHERE manufacturer = 'XYZ Corp' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM Fertilizers WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM fertilizers;
SELECT id, name, brand, quantity FROM fertilizers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, quantity, manufacturing_date FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT id, name, type FROM pesticides WHERE toxicity_level > 5 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM fertilizers WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, brand FROM fertilizers WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM pesticides WHERE toxicity_level >= 5 AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, name, type, quantity FROM pesticides WHERE batch_number LIKE 'BATCH-%' ORDER BY name, id DESC;
SELECT id, name, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM pesticide_inventory WHERE supplier='ABC Inc';
SELECT id, supplier, quantity FROM fertilizer_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%Warehouse%';
SELECT transaction_date, quantity_changed FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_type='IN' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity, supplier FROM pesticide_inventory WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, supplier FROM pesticide_inventory WHERE toxicity_level = 'High' ORDER BY supplier ASC;
SELECT location_name, COUNT(*) AS total_inventory FROM inventory_locations GROUP BY location_name;
SELECT * FROM inventory_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_type = 'Addition' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Fertilizers;
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM Pesticides WHERE quantity >= 100;
SELECT name, supplier FROM Fertilizers ORDER BY supplier ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT id, transaction_type, quantity_change, transaction_date FROM Transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT name, quantity, supplier FROM Fertilizers WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Pesticides WHERE supplier = 'ABC Suppliers' OR supplier = 'XYZ Suppliers';
SELECT name, quantity FROM Fertilizers WHERE supplier = 'PQR Suppliers' AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_type, i.quantity, t.transaction_date FROM Transactions t INNER JOIN Inventory i ON t.inventory_id = i.id WHERE t.quantity_change > 0 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT s.name, s.address, i.quantity FROM Suppliers s LEFT JOIN Inventory i ON s.id = i.fertilizer_id OR s.id = i.pesticide_id ORDER BY s.name ASC, i.quantity DESC;
